questions.question: What do we celebrate on Chanukah?

choices.answer: The Jewish people's survival
The miracle of the oil and the Maccabee victory
Jewish people being freed from Greek slavery
Freedom to eat greasy food

questions.question: Why is Chanukah an eight day festival?

choices.answer: Because its like Sukkot and Pesach
Because the miracle of the oil lasted for eight days
Because 8 is the number of infinity
Because we want to get eight presents

questions.question: What did Antiochus forbid the Jewish people to do?

choices.answer: From keeping Shabbat and the holidays
Studying Torah
Having Jewish weddings and Brit Milah
All of the above

questions.question: Why do we play dreidel?

choices.answer: Children hid their Torah study and pretended to play
Because Chanukah makes us dizzy
We want to win a lot of Gelt on Chanukah
To remember the miracle of the oil

questions.question: Why did Matityahu decide to fight the Greeks?

choices.answer: He was tired of being bossed around
He wanted to practice his fighting moves
He was asked to offer a sacrifice to an idol, and refused
He wanted to prove that the Jews were stronger

questions.question: How many original Maccabees were there?
How were the Maccabees able to win over the mighty Syrian Greeks? Two correct answers!

choices.answer: They attacked them from the mountains
They practiced their Krav Maga skills
They prayed for Hashem's help
They sent spies to find out where they were going

questions.question: What did the Syrian Greeks do to the Beit Hamikdash?

choices.answer: They made it into a gymnasium
They turned it into a theater
Brought their pagan idols in and offered pigs as sacrifices
They decided to leave it as it was

questions.question: What were the Maccabees searching for in the Beit Hamikdash?

choices.answer: A sealed jar of oil to light the Menorah with
hidden treasure
Chanukah Gelt
the hidden Menorah

questions.question: Why did the miracle of the oil last for eight days?

choices.answer: Because eight is better than seven
It would take 8 days to get the best olive oil
We wanted to have eight nights of Chanukah

questions.question: What makes this Menorah not kosher?

choices.answer: It has ten branches
The candles are not on the same level
The shamash is not higher
IIt's not an oil Menorah

questions.question: How do we light the Menorah?

choices.answer: We light it from left to right
We add another candle each night
We place the candles in from right to left
All of the above

questions.question: Where should we light the Menorah?

choices.answer: In our dining room
In the closet
By the window or door
Outside our house

questions.question: What time do we light the candles?

choices.answer: As soon as it gets dark
At midnight
in the afternoon
in the morning

questions.question: What are the Brachot we say when we light the Menorah?

choices.answer: L'hadlik ner she chanukah and Sheasa nisim l'avoteinu
Maoz Zor
Al Mitzvat Menorah
Al Hanisim

questions.question: What is a prayer we add on Chanukah? 2 right answers!

choices.answer: Hallel
Al Hanisim
Chanukah, Oh Chanukah
Dreidel, Dreidel

questions.question: In addition to the Menorah, how else do we remember the miracle of the oil?

choices.answer: by investing in oil stocks
by drinking cod liver oil
by eating fried food like latkes and donuts

questions.question: What do the letters on the dreidel stand for?

choices.answer: Chanukah is so much fun
Nes Gadol Haya Shum, a great miracle happened here
nothing, everything, put one in, half

questions.question: Why do we light at night and where people could see?

choices.answer: To show everyone we are Jewish
To publicize the miracle of  Chanukah
To shed light on the dark street

questions.question: How can we be a Jewish Maccabee today?

choices.answer: We can be proud to be Jewish
We can stand up for what's right
We can defend the Torah and Mitzvot
All of the above
